name: Pandormou
description:
Pandormou is a short infinite runner made for the Panda-Mic Game Jam.

During the coronavirus pandemic, a panda has escaped the zoo and is running through a subway. The subway is infected with viruses, and he is equipped with masks, gloves and sanitizers to fend the virus off. How far can it make it?

--- Controls ---
[Space] Jump
[1] Use mask [air particles]
[2] Use gloves [surface particles]
[3] Use sanitizer [disinfect]

--- Credits ---
Programming: Aimilios Seimenis, Dimitris Provatas
Art Direction & Game Design: Nicolas Joukowski
Music & Sound Effects: Nikolas Platon

Special thanks to Angie Apostolou for additional graphics work.
